name: Uncrumpled
description:
Make sure to turn on your sound!!

Uncrumpled is a game about a sort of daring duo of heroes, getting pulled into the universe of a terrible artist. 

Movement is A & D for left/right, Spacebar to jump, left click to shoot once you get the "gun"

I hope you enjoy, but you probably won't hahaha

Credits:

Everything : Ted Roman
